feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Wed, 11 Oct 2023 08:03:41
entry.summary:
Tech:
- A New CLIR Publication: "The Chinese Archive: A Pocket Manual" - LJ INFOdocket
- HAProxy is not affected by the HTTP/2 Rapid Reset Attack (CVE-2023-44487)
- Show HN: I learned to code and built a crypto analytics platform all by myself

Business:
- Sam Bankman-Fried's risk appetite was so large that he would flip a coin if losing meant destroying the world, Caroline Ellison testified
- George Santos accused of stealing campaign donors' credit card information and paying his own campaign in new superseding indictment
- SumUp's valuation falls as low as $4.1B, as Groupon and others sell off their stakes
- Wiley CEO Brian Napack Exits, Company Cancels Investor Day - MarketWatch
- Chipotle is raising prices for the 4th time in 2 years
- Bill Ackman calls on Harvard to release the names of students in groups holding Israel responsible for Hamas violence — so CEOs don't 'inadvertently hire' them

AI:
- AI Will Save The World with Marc Andreessen and Martin Casado

Other:
- Tanks and their big guns get all the attention, but Russia's smaller cannons are wreaking havoc against Ukrainian troops
- Image shows the last remaining debris from the Titan submersible implosion recovered by the Coast Guard
- Amazon Prime Day travel deals: Save up to 60% on suitcases, packing cubes, tech
- Here's the military support the US is sending toward Israel, from US Navy ships to munitions
- Israel is launching airstrikes against Hamas across Gaza, causing immense destruction, and asking for more US-made weapons to do it
- US travelers describe chaotic scenes inside Israel's 'completely mobbed' Ben Gurion airport amid war with Gaza
- US gas prices are going down—but the Israel-Hamas war could complicate that
- The Hard Things About Scaling: Executive Hiring with Ben Horowitz and Ali Ghodsi
- 2 Science-Backed Ways To Fall Back In Love With Your Partner
- 50 years on, photos show the 19-day Arab-Israeli War that changed the course of history
- US credit downgrade means junk sovereign bonds now outweigh AAA debt for the first time, Fitch says

Insights:
- The tech industry is seeing advancements in coding and crypto analytics platforms.
- Business news includes testimonies, indictments, company valuations, and price increases.
- AI is discussed as a solution for saving the world.
- Other topics cover military support, travel deals, war, airport chaos, gas prices, executive hiring, relationship advice, and historical events.
- The broader topics highlight a range of current events and trends.
